TextBlock.Text: When we left our home body it was to escape conflict and to seek a new life and new discoveries. For 207 cycles we drifted peacefully upon the astral sea. But we soon made a discovery we were unprepared to face.

We first encountered macroscopic quantum phenomena 156 cycles after setting out upon our journey. A single rock, mobile when unobserved. But more soon followed: forests, then asteroids, then entire bodies as we approached the epicenter.
As we hung in orbit around the vortex, I studied it, its properties, and its extensive influence. Not even the basic structure of the galaxy remained constant. Entire clusters shifted at its whim.
When we finally pieced together what it represented, we were all gripped by fear. It was an end, and a new beginning. - Scientist
